bio.en: Transforming your ideas into high-quality, high-performance websites. Specialized in building custom business solutions with 2.5 years of technical expertise.
bio.id: Sulap ide lo jadi web kece badai & ngebut parah. Spesialis bikin solusi bisnis custom, udah 2.5 tahun ngoding nih, senggol dong!

desc.en: High-quality websites starting from just 200k IDR. Perfect for small businesses.
desc.id: Web mantul mulai 200rb-an. Pas bet buat UMKM & branding diri sendiri. Murah tapi ga murahan cuy!

desc.en: I value your time. Guaranteed fast communication and timely delivery.
desc.id: Sat set wat wet. Chat langsung bales, ngerjain ga pake lelet. Anti ghosting club.

desc.en: I'll keep refining until your website perfectly matches your vision.
desc.id: Gas terus revisi sampe lo bilang 'NAH INI BARU MANTAP!'. Kita gass sampe jadi.

desc.en: Get 1-2 extra pages for free to enhance your website's content.
desc.id: Gratis nambah 1-2 halaman biar web lo makin menyala abangku. Makin lengkap makin asik.

desc.en: Free hosting included so your website goes live immediately without extra costs.
desc.id: Udah dapet gratis hosting cuy! Web lo langsung online tanpa pusing mikirin server. Hemat beut!

desc.en: Built to be Google-friendly and lightning fast on all devices.
desc.id: Settingan SEO tingkat dewa biar nangkring di page wan Google. Traffic auto deres!

cta_desc.en: Ready to take your business online? Contact me now to discuss your project.
cta_desc.id: Udah siap go online? Chat gue sekarang buat ngobrolin ide liar lo, gasss!
